GitLab Remote Software Engineering Internship 2026

Fully remote internship contributing to GitLab product and open core.

CompanyGitLab
RoleSoftware Engineering Intern
LocationRemote
Duration12 weeks
StipendPaid; competitive remote stipend (Expected/Indicative)
Work HoursFull-time remote
Employment TypeIntern
ExperiencePractical coding in backend/frontend and Git workflows

Eligibility & Skills

  • Students/new grads with solid coding, tests, and remote readiness
  • Education: UG/PG in CS/IT or equivalent experience
  • Branches allowed: Computer Science, Information Technology, Electronics, Any with coding
  • Skills: Backend or frontend (Ruby/Go/JS), Git and MR workflows, Testing and CI
  • Year of study: Pre-final/final year or recent grads
  • Age limit: Per company policy

GitLab Remote Software Engineering Internship 2026

Introduction

GitLab is all-remote and open core. This internship lets you ship features and fixes to GitLab with distributed teams. Dates/stipend are Expected/Indicative.

Program Overview

  • Remote pairing, MRs, and code reviews
  • Work across backend/frontend/CI and observability
  • Paid monthly; access to async mentorship

Eligibility

  • Strong coding samples; familiarity with Git workflows
  • Comfort working async and writing detailed updates

How to Apply

  1. Apply via GitLab internships page with CV and repo links. 2) Complete take-home or live exercise. 3) MR review and interviews; confirm availability.

FAQs

  • Paid? Yes, competitive stipend (Expected/Indicative).
  • Remote? 100% remote.
  • Need GitLab experience? Not required; Git experience essential.

Ready to apply?

Applications close on 18 March 2026.
